detail_desc: A-line strappy top in a jacquard weave with a small opening at the back. Narrow cut at the top with a frill trim and drawstring at the top that ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave in a narrow cut with gathers at the top. Short, narrow shoulder straps, and opening and button at the back of the neck and a lace trimmed hem.

Jeggings in washed denim with a stretch function enabling the jeggings to hold their shape. Regular waist with covered elastication, fake front pockets, a coin pocket, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.
5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly and button.
Oversized T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a round neckline, gently dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Jacket in imitation leather with a faux shearling-lined collar, zip down the front and diagonal, zipped side pockets. Faux shearling lining.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulder and at the crotch.
Ankle-length leggings in sturdy jacquard-patterned jersey. Regular waist with concealed elastication and slim legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a partially reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flared legs.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Hat in loosely braided straw with a narrow imitation suede band. Width of brim approx. 7 cm.
Metal hair grips decorated with round plastic beads and a flower with a strawberry-shaped pendant. The zinc content of the hair grips is recycled.
Calf-length dress in a double-layered cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen and a concealed button placket. Round neckline and long sleeves that taper to a buttoned cuff.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a glittery print motif on the front.

Hi-tops in waterproof functional fabric with glittery sections and imitation leather details. Padded top edge, an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the hi-tops on. Reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Leather wallet with eight card slots and four larger compartments. Fabric lining. Size 10x11.5 cm.

Padded, quilted parka in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Tie belt at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined. Polyester filling.
Poncho in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck and fringed hem.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front with a tie, and long sleeves with a small frill trim at the cuffs. Scalloped lace trim at the front.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.

Long dress in a crêpe weave with embroidered, scalloped edges. Double-layered bodice,an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length, gently flared sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined with a shorter, V-neck dress in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Fancy dress costume in soft pile with a hood and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Wide, satin-covered Alice band.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with frill-trimmed shoulders.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative bow on the front.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof, functional fabric with imitation leather details and an ankle-height shaft with an elastic drawstring at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and dungaree dress in a cotton weave. Top with a round neck and short sleeves. Dress with adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, and elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 4 cm.
Playsuit in an airy weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist, short cap sleeves and short, wide legs with lace-trimmed hems. Jersey lining.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps in a contrasting colour and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal earrings with large, round pendants in plastic. Length 8 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders and long flounced sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Ankle boots with a zip in one side, round toes, a decorative seam at the front and covered block heels. Cotton canvas linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length slip dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, concealed zip in one side and slit at the back.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Zip fly and concealed button, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at one hip, reflective details, and legs with ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees and a zip at the hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in faux fur with earflaps, a sewn-in turn-up at the front and a strap with press-studs under the chin. Jersey lining.
Sun visor in patterned cotton twill with adjustable elastication and a hook and loop fastener.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and concealed hook and eye at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be pulled to tighten from the sides.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short slits in the sides.
A pair of earrings in metal decorated with thin chains.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose and cotton jersey with a wide lace flounce at the top.
Trainers with a knot detail at the top and concealed elastic gores in the sides. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Joggers in supersoft, stretch denim with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets and a welt back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative metal studs. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
